title: The art of persuasive storytelling | Kelly D. Parker
excerpt: "Storytelling is one of the most powerful marketing and leadership tools there is," says communications expert Kelly D. Parker. She explains how stories make proposals of all kinds more memorable — and shows how you can craft a compelling narrative to connect, persuade and drive meaningful action.

title: Storytelling as a Craft: Advice from 5 Experts on How to Tell a Compelling
excerpt: Every startup leader should practice flexing their storytelling muscles. To help warm these muscles up, we’ve rounded up some of our best advice about storytelling in business that’s been featured in the Review.

title: The Power of Audience-Centered Storytelling | Bill Carmody | TEDxFergusonLibrary
excerpt:
Bill Carmody is a twenty-five year global keynote speaker. He’s had the incredible privilege to present in Brazil with Sir Richard Branson and in India with executives from Fortune 100 companies. Recently he had the distinct privilege to teach several of the UK Brexit government officials how to become more powerful public speakers.
